overview: Eiki Kinashi (Reo Nagatsuma), a caf√© clerk, is actually a young man with a hidden face of "thief". His target this time is Yuzuki Mayumura (Sae Miyazawa), a female police officer who wishes for the world to end as soon as possible. Kinashi sneaks into her room and finds a letter in an envelope containing cash that reads, "I've been watching you for a long time." However, one day, when Kinashi returns to her home after finishing her part-time job, he notices that her pet dog, Tennen-kun, is nowhere to be found. Will Kinashi be able to recapture Tennen-kun?
title: Inu Kaitenshite Nigeru
